module.name: Backup & Restore
module.description: Backup & Restore for your FreePBX environment
module.changelog: *15.0.8.21* FREEPBX-20017 Can't install latest Backup & Restore module due to Cutom Cron entry *15.0.8.20* bump *15.0.8.19* Fixing Backup allows to create Empty and Duplicate entries. *15.0.8.18* Fixing FREEPBX-20028 Delete issue from edit section *15.0.8.17* FREEPBX-19984 only restore legacy pbx tables (for now) *15.0.8.16* FREEPBX-19890 Check for existence of a private key, not public *15.0.8.15* FREEPBX-19931 *15.0.8.14* FREEPBX-19921 *15.0.8.13* Catch errors during cleanup but dont abort *15.0.8.12* FREEPBX-19882 *15.0.8.11* FREEPBX-19679 *15.0.8.10* FREEPBX-19675 *15.0.8.9* Jump to restore if one is active *15.0.8.8* FREEPBX-19651 *15.0.8.7* Dont store metadata about backups *15.0.8.6* FREEPBX-19660 and network connectivity issues *15.0.8.4* FREEI-429 *15.0.8.3* FREEI-429 *15.0.8.2* Fix migrations *15.0.8.1* FREEPBX-19634 Unable to send backup email *15.0.8* Fix backup issues *15.0.7* Handle restores from 12 or lower (scary) *15.0.6* Rework functions from filestore *15.0.5.3* Remove duplicated log message *15.0.5.1* Allow framework to be backed up *15.0.5* implement default fallback for unimplemented modules using --fallback cli option *15.0.4.6* Bug fixes and speed enhancements *15.0.4.5* reference to object fix *15.0.4.4* reference to object fix *15.0.4.3* reference to object fix *15.0.4.2* Add back migration *15.0.4.1* Add Additional warning *15.0.3beta7* FREEPBX-18886 Fix long polling on backup log *15.0.3beta6* Set the debug flag to false which will clean up old data db data *15.0.3beta5* FREEPBX-18709 Fix corrupt backups, fix restore log *15.0.3beta4* FREEPBX-18155 Move echo to logger in legacy *15.0.3beta3* FREEPBX-18882 Update help text in fwconsole *15.0.3beta2* FREEPBX-18885 Fix cron syntax, don't hardcode sbin. *15.0.3beta1* Bump to beta *15.0.3alpha15* FREEPBX-18754 Updates for logger in framework 15.0.1.33 *15.0.3alpha14* FREEPBX-18625 Rework the message handling *15.0.3alpha14* FREEPBX-18166 *15.0.3alpha14* Fixing problems in Backup 15 *15.0.3alpha11* New Backup and Restore for 15.0 *15.0.3alpha10* FREEPBX-18160 More fixes to server migrations *15.0.3alpha9* FREEPBX-18252 Fix variables in Backup, handle the use of a single module *15.0.3alpha8* FREEPBX-18202 Fix restore file ajax handling *15.0.3alpha7* FREEPBX-18160 Migration improvements *15.0.3alpha6* FREEPBX-18215 Fix the mail handler validation *15.0.3alpha5* FREEPBX-18210 Remove unimplemented tab *15.0.3alpha4* FREEPBX-18160 Fix server migration *15.0.3alpha3* Remove unneeded composer deps *15.0.3alpha2* Fix import of cron job for backup migration *15.0.3alpha1* Alpha 1 release of the Backup 15 module *15.0.2.1* Don't crash on a new install *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Initial release of new backup module
